    • getConfig

      public static org.json.simple.JSONObject getConfig() throws FileNotFoundException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      Get the config JSON for the database
      Returns:
      JSONObject containing the config data for the database
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - Thrown if the db cannot find the config file
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - Thrown if the config file content is not valid JSON
